betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After mastering how to transport, you can now use meta-dynamic energy, which has 3 other uses besides taking effect directly on mage gauntlets: charging, generating power, and converting group systems. 

About energizing: Meta-dynamic bases are used to energize items that require meta-dynamic energy, such as meta-dynamic batteries, mage gauntlets fitted with meta-dynamic batteries, and some devices that can't draw energy directly from the rift. 

About Power Generation: Since there are no industrial modules in this pack, crafting a meta-dynamic generator is not recommended and there will be no corresponding quests. 

About Converting Cluster Systems: Used to charge Arcane Cluster Converters, the magnitude of its consumption is such that it is recommended to use a Meta-Dynamic Matrix for storage, which we will explain later.
